Title: Herborg Holm to John Holm Card 1947 Summer
Description: POSTCARD FROM HERBORG HOLM WITH A PICTURE OF –FROSOTORNET LIT UP–, UNDATED BUT PROBABLY WRITTEN END JULY/EARLY AUG. AS THAT'S WHEN HERBORG WAS ON VACATION IN ØSTERSUND.  TO HRR (MR.) JOHAN HOLM, 108 WEST 5TH. STREET, DELL RAPIDS, SYD DAKOTA, U.S.A.  THE STAMP HAS BEEN REMOVED.
Creator: Herborg Holm
Siri Lawson, trans.
Text:
I am now in Østersund in Sweden together with 4 friends.  We sleep in a tent and have the world’s most wonderful weather.  It’s beautiful here and many beautiful things to buy.  We’re going to bike home 27 miles (Norwegian miles).

Regards  Herborg Holm
